attributes.title: Figure3 In A New Subspecies Of Short-Toed Snake-Eagle From Wallacea Determined From Morphological And Dna Comparison
attributes.description: FIGURE3. Lesser Sundas and Palearctic specimens of C.gallicus. The specimens pictured in Figure 2A are male:the left two are from Flores in the Lesser Sundas, while the rightmost specimen is from Romania. The specimen in the center is the holotype of our new C. gallicus sacerdotis. Two female and one unsexed C. gallicus are shown in Figure 2B. The leftmost specimen is a female from Romania, the center specimen is a female from Roti island, while the rightmost specimen is an unsexed individual from Flores.

attributes.title: Figure3 In A New Subspecies Of Short-Toed Snake-Eagle From Wallacea Determined From Morphological And Dna Comparison
attributes.description: FIGURE3. Lesser Sundas and Palearctic specimens of C.gallicus. The specimens pictured in Figure 2A are male:the left two are from Flores in the Lesser Sundas, while the rightmost specimen is from Romania. The specimen in the center is the holotype of our new C. gallicus sacerdotis. Two female and one unsexed C. gallicus are shown in Figure 2B. The leftmost specimen is a female from Romania, the center specimen is a female from Roti island, while the rightmost specimen is an unsexed individual from Flores.

attributes.title: Figure 10 In A New Kukri Snake (Colubridae: Oligodon) From Hua Hin District, And The First Record Of O. Deuvei From Thailand
attributes.description: FIGURE 10. Geographical location of the type-locality of Oligodon huahin sp. nov. in Prachuap Khiri Khan Province, peninsular Thailand (red star), and of the first Thai record of O. deuvei in Loei Province, northeastern Thailand (blue dot). Map by W. Sodoab.
